title: Median age of the population in New Zealand 2015
summary: In general Median age in years has rose over the Year.
Median age in years is slightly decreasing from 1950 to 1965, roughly constant from 1965 to 1970, gradually increasing from 1970 to 2005, and lastly roughly constant from 2005 to 2020.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 1995 and 2000.
Maximum Median age in years, about 38.0 was reported at Year 2020
The lowest Median age in years, of value 25.6 was reported at Year 1970
